text:
Producer, do you have a recommended
course for walking or anything?

Yeah,
On my days off I go walking a lot.

Hmm, if it were
about running then...

Eeh
I'm already used yo walking around this area...!

Ah, but... if you were to come walk with me
it might still be quite fun.

Indeed... there are some good areas
surprisingly close by, aren't there.
Maybe I should invite some girls from the dorms along.

Eh, are you perhaps thinking
about training now...?
Come on, this isn't supposed to be about work!
